solution_line_template: So he paid {original_price}-{discount_amount}=${price_after_discount}<<{original_price}-{discount_amount}={price_after_discount}>>{price_after_discount} for the shirts
That means he paid {price_after_discount}/{num_shirts}=${cost_per_shirt}<<{price_after_discount}/{num_shirts}={cost_per_shirt}>>{cost_per_shirt} per shirt
